# AttributeContainer.Builder

**Structure**

A type that iteratively builds attribute containers by setting attribute values.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Builder<T> where T : AttributedStringKey
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer/Builder] type lets you build [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer] instances by chaining together several attributes in one expression. The following example shows this approach:

```swift
// An attribute container with the link and backgroundColor attributes.
let myContainer = AttributeContainer().link(myURL).backgroundColor(.yellow)
```

The first part of this expression, `AttributeContainer().link(URL(myURL))`, creates a builder to apply the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/FoundationAttributes/link] attribute to the empty [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer]. The builder’s [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer/Builder/callAsFunction(_:)] returns a new [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer] with this attribute set. Then the `backgroundColor(.yellow)` creates a second builder to modify the just-returned [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer] by adding the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeScopes/SwiftUIAttributes/backgroundColor] attribute. The result is an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/AttributeContainer] with both attributes set.

## Calling Builder Functions

- **callAsFunction(_:)**: Builds an attribute container by setting an attribute and returning a modified attribute container.

## Accessing Attributes

- **subscript(_:)**: Returns the attribute that corresponds to a specified key.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the attribute that corresponds to a specified key path.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns the attribute container that corresponds to a specified key path.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns a modified attribute container as part of building a chain of attributes.
- **subscript(dynamicMember:)**: Returns a modified attribute container as part of building a chain of attributes, for use as a static method.
- **AttributedStringKey**: A type that defines an attribute’s name and type.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
